com.articulate.nlp

Class NERAnnotator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.articulate.nlp.NERAnnotator

  • public class NERAnnotator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class marks NER strings and annotates with their SUMO class membership and if a multi-word, their span .

    • Method Detail

      • toSUMO

        public static java.lang.String toSUMO(IntPair ip,
                                      java.util.List<CoreLabel> tokens)
        Long term, there's probably a way to deduce a more specific class membership for a token, but for now we just map the NER classes. Note that Money, Percent, Date, Time will be complex expressions rather than classes, and need different treatment elsewhere.

      • toToken

        public static java.lang.String toToken(IntPair ip,
                                       java.util.List<CoreLabel> tokens)
        Create a KIF variable token corresponding to each original word separated by underscores and ending with the number of the first token

      • markTokens

        public static void markTokens(java.util.List<CoreLabel> tokens)
        Mark all the multiwords in the text with their synset, sumo term and the span of the multiword using tokens indexes (which start at 0 and not token numbers, which start at 1)

        Mark all the multiwords in the text with their synset, sumo term and the span of the multiword using tokens indexes (which start at 0 and not token numbers, which start at 1)
